pli-tv-pvr16:4.2: na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena → na kaṇḍūsakaraṇamattena (sya-all); na gaṇḍusakaraṇamattena (mr); na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena → na ovaṭṭeyyakaraṇamattena (bj, sya-all); na ovadeyyakaraṇamattena (mr); ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena → ovattikaraṇa ... (bj); ovaṭṭikaraṇa ... (sya-all)
pli-tv-pvr16:59.1: Tiṇṇaṃ → bhedā tiṇṇaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); bhedato tiṇṇaṃ (mr)
